Title: City of Thieves
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Merriwether Williams (story by), Timothy McKeon (story by), Bert Youn, Sean Jimenez
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Violet Sole Closs Farley, Dee Bradley Baker
Plot: A mission leads Jake into a city where everyone is a thief and the chance to be corrupted is incredibly strong.
